body.name: Olay Firming & Hydrating Body Lotion with Collagen, 17 fl oz Pump, (Pack of 4)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
features: PENETRATES SKIN UP TO 10 LAYERS DEEP: This fast-absorbing formula, made for all skin types, was crafted by Olay skin experts to moisturize and hydrate to increase skin cell turnover
FAST-ABSORBING FORMULA: Formulated to be moisturizing yet lightweight, this cream won’t give your skin a coated feeling
EXPERTLY CRAFTED WITH COLLAGEN: Crafted by Olay experts to hydrate your skin with plumping moisture that tightens and diminishes fine lines for a visible skin transformation
VISIBLY IMPROVES SKIN: Vitamin B3 hydrates your skin allowing it to retain its own moisture—think of it as the ultimate skin-improvement ingredient that leaves you with softer, smoother-feeling skin
USE TOGETHER: Use with Olay Skin Care-Inspired Body Wash to boost effects of Vitamin B3 Complex and moisturizing ingredients
body.description: Fortify your skin’s foundation with Olay Firming & Hydrating Body Lotion. This moisturizing lotion has a nutrient-rich formula crafted with collagen and our Vitamin B3 Complex and was created specifically to tighten and plump skin while diminishing fine lines. Why add Vitamin B3 Complex into your routine? It’s the ultimate skin-improvement ingredient. Vitamin B3 allows your skin to hold on to water so it can become its own moisturizer. It also leaves you with skin that acts younger, feels softer, and looks smoother. You can expect a visible skin transformation without the greasy residue that other types of body cream can leave behind. This body cream also absorbs quickly, penetrating skin up to 10 layers deep, leaving your skin with long-lasting smoothness and increased skin cell turnover. Make sure you take a minute to appreciate its lovely packaging—it’s definitely worthy of your counter space. Use daily all over your body during your morning or evening routine. Use with Olay Skin Care-Inspired Body Wash to boost effects of Vitamin B3 Complex and moisturizing ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Pampering for Mother's Day
reviews.reviewText: The Olay Firming Body Lotion with Collagen bulk pack is the perfect Mother's Day gift for indulging your mom in luxurious pampering. This revitalizing lotion offers a transformative skincare experience, leaving the skin feeling nourished, firm, and supple.With its unique blend of collagen and hydrating ingredients, this body lotion provides intense moisture that helps improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of dryness and sagging. It absorbs quickly, leaving behind a velvety-smooth texture and a subtle, refreshing fragrance that lingers throughout the day.The bulk pack allows for long-lasting use, ensuring your mother can enjoy the benefits of this incredible lotion for an extended period of time. Its high-quality formula and dermatologically-tested components guarantee optimum results, making it suitable for all skin types.As an esteemed brand, Olay has been trusted for decades, and this firming body lotion with collagen is no exception. It delivers visible results and imparts a youthful glow, making your mom feel pampered and confident in her own skin.In summary, the Olay Firming Body Lotion with Collagen bulk pack is a perfect gift to celebrate Mother's Day. Its luxurious formula, long-lasting supply, and effective results will make your mom feel indulged and cherished. Treat her to this pampering experience, and watch her skin radiate with the love and care you've bestowed upon her. My mom loved the fact that she doesn’t have to buy any for a while now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has helped with thin fragile skin
reviews.reviewText: Smells nice and has helped my dry / thin skin not tear as easily. Has restored some elasticity. Leaves skin nice and soft without feeling greasy or oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this body lotion!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many lotions in my life but this stuff is the best I have tried so far! I have dry skin that I typically just live with in the summer months but once winter hits, I have to use body lotion every day. This lotion is light, not at all greasy, and leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and soft all day long. I have been raving about this lotion to everyone I know and just purchased some for a friend of mine. A-M-A-Z-I-N-G product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome lotion for aging skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. It smells wonderful and helps the crepey skin on my arms and legs look and feel smooth and moisturized all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lotion after reading about it on my weight loss group. It smells great and isn’t too greasy. Does it firm up your skin??? It seems to but you have to use on a consistent basis both morning and night. If you don’t use it or take a break from it, the “firmness” of your skin goes away. Overall, I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product last until washed off. Consistently does a great job in preventing dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for the Money
reviews.reviewText: When I was a child; my mother used Oil of Olay face cream. As a large family - always budgeting, Oil of Olay was a ‘small’ luxury she allowed herself. The excellence and economy of this product is amazing and affordable. My mother would be proud. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product
reviews.reviewText: My friends like and love the great gift of the product. They love it and would want to say thanks for its good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: I really love the txtr of this product and really fel like I am doing something positive for my skin
reviews.reviewText: Especially like how my skin feels after applying this product.
